trans-unit.source: Represents a query that is never satisfied by a message that it tests.
trans-unit.target: 表示它會測試訊息永遠不會符合的查詢。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a filter that never allows a message through.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供永遠不會允許訊息通過的篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter.Match%2A> methods returns `false` for every message that is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter.Match%2A>方法傳回`false`針對不是每個訊息`null`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter.Match%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used to create distinct instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter>.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可以用來建立不同的執行個體的<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for every message that is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>針對不是每個訊息<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The difference between the two overloads of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter.Match%2A> method is that one takes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> parameter and buffers the entire contents of a message (including its body) into memory, while the other takes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> parameter and does not buffer the body.
trans-unit.target: 兩個多載之間的差異<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter.Match%2A>方法是一個接受<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>參數和緩衝區的整個內容 （包括其本文） 訊息到記憶體中，而另一個接受<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>參數且不緩衝本文。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter.Match%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for every message that is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>針對不是每個訊息<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method takes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> parameter, which buffers the entire contents of a message (including its body) into memory, and allows the body to be inspected.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會採用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>參數的整個內容的訊息 （包括其本文） 緩衝到記憶體中，並允許檢查本文。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>
